DOC.brief_summary: Randomised trial of chemotherapy or not before surgery in early resectable stages of NSCLC (IB, IIA, IIB, and IIIA/N2).
DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Non Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Stages IB, IIA, IIB, and IIIA/T3
DOC.detailed_description: Randomisation between 3 courses of neoadjuvant Carboplatin plus Paclitaxel or no chemotherapy before surgery.
DOC.criteria: NSCLC Stages IB, IIA, IIB, IIIA/T3 Lung function test allowing surgery Age 1875 years Poor lung function Performance status 34 Mediastinal lymph node involvement
